pullRequest.title: [BEAM-10468] Revamped SchemaCapableIOProvider interface to SchemaIOProvider
pullRequest.bodyText:
Revamped SchemaCapableIOProvider to SchemaIOProvider in anticipation of schema aware IOs, which, unlike SchemaCapableIOProviders, do not require a data schema passed from the user. A requiresDataSchema boolean is added to SchemaIOProvider interface to distinguish between the cases where a schema passed from the user is necessary or the schema can be inferred from the data structure. The discussion can be seen in the comments of the design doc:
https://docs.google.com/document/d/1ic3P8EVGHIydHQ-VMDKbN9kEdwm7sBXMo80VrhwksvI/edit
R:@TheNeuralBit
R:@robinyqiu

nodes.bodyText:
Consider removing requiresDataSchema() because it is always true here?
I know this is the general logic but in this specific provider this call is not necessary.

commit.message: Modified schemaIOProvider to use standard boolean
